Version 0.9.7-pre.2 - Pre-release. Enhanced Visual Effects with doubled particle count for better visibility, Linux distribution fixes for AppImage and tar.gz asset loading, and improved asset path resolution.
Version 0.9.6 - Stable Release. Performance and Architecture improvements with documentation synchronization, modular system architecture with enhanced utility systems, and code quality maintenance.
Version 0.9.6-pre.2 - Pre-release. Development version building upon 0.9.5 stable foundation with continued improvements.
Version 0.9.6-pre.1 - Pre-release. Development version building upon 0.9.5 stable foundation with state management fixes.
Version 0.9.5 - Stable Release. LLVM code formatting applied, comprehensive version management, and code quality improvements.
​
Version 0.9.4 - Stable Release. Major particle system optimization with 83% performance improvement through VertexArray batching, universal card animations for all collection types, element-colored board sprites for visual consistency, C++17 compatibility fixes, LLVM code formatting, and enhanced visual feedback system.
Version 0.9.4-pre.2 - Pre-release. Particle system optimization with 83% performance improvement, universal card animations, C++17 compatibility fixes, and code formatting cleanup.
Version 0.9.4-pre.1 - Pre-release. Version bump for continued development and testing.
​
Windows ZIP Packaging Fix Enhanced - Pre-release. Enhanced Windows ZIP package generation by explicitly enabling CPACK_BINARY_ZIP, improved workflow to always attempt both NSIS and ZIP packaging, and enhanced debugging output for Windows package creation process.
​
Major CI/CD Pipeline Enhancement - Final Release. Comprehensive overhaul of build and release infrastructure with robust cross-platform packaging, enhanced input system reliability, and streamlined development workflows.
Key Improvements:
Input System Enhancements: Fixed intro mouse click skipping functionality, improved fullscreen toggle behavior, and enhanced user interaction responsiveness
CI/CD Pipeline Robustness: Complete AppImage creation reliability with proper FUSE setup, automatic group management, and comprehensive error handling
Cross-Platform Packaging: Enhanced Windows ZIP package generation alongside NSIS installers, fixed artifact upload logic, and unified packaging workflows
Development Workflow: Synchronized regular builds with release workflows, improved debugging output, and enhanced build consistency across all platforms
Technical Infrastructure: Comprehensive FUSE configuration, icon path fixes, conditional logic improvements, and build process optimization
This release represents a major step forward in build reliability and developer experience, ensuring consistent package creation across Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms.
Windows ZIP Packaging Fix Enhanced - Pre-release. Fixed Windows ZIP package generation workflow logic to ensure both NSIS and ZIP generators run independently, added explicit CPACK_BINARY_ZIP configuration, enhanced packaging workflow with dual generator execution for reliable ZIP archive creation.
Windows ZIP Packaging Fix - Pre-release. Fixed Windows ZIP package generation by adding ZIP to CPACK_GENERATOR alongside NSIS, ensuring both EXE installer and ZIP archive are created during Windows builds, resolved missing ZIP artifacts in GitHub releases.
CI/CD Artifact Upload Fix - Pre-release. Fixed conditional logic in GitHub Actions workflows preventing TGZ and ZIP artifacts from being uploaded to releases. Corrected input.test_mode handling for tag-triggered builds, ensuring all package formats reach GitHub releases reliably.
​ ​
AppImage Icon Path Fix - Pre-release. Fixed AppImage icon path issues that prevented AppImage creation, corrected icon file paths from non-existent net.devcarpet.deerportal.png to actual DeerPortal.iconset/icon_256x256.png, enhanced AppImage creation robustness with comprehensive icon fallback strategies. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
FUSE Group Creation Fix - Pre-release. Fixed FUSE group creation issue in GitHub Actions workflows, enhanced group management with automatic fuse group creation and immediate group changes application, comprehensive FUSE setup reliability improvements for AppImage creation. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
CI/CD FUSE and AppImage Fixes - Pre-release. Resolved AppImage creation failures in GitHub Actions by ensuring proper FUSE installation and configuration, enhanced Linux artifact reliability with mandatory FUSE setup, comprehensive CI/CD pipeline robustness improvements. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Input System Improvements - Pre-release. Fixed intro mouse click skipping functionality, enhanced CI/CD artifact upload reliability with robust file detection and error handling, improved fullscreen toggle behavior, and comprehensive workflow debugging enhancements. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Computer Player Card Notification Delay - Final Release. Implemented 4-second delay for computer player card notifications allowing human players sufficient time to read card messages. Enhanced game flow timing and user experience improvements for turn-based gameplay. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Windows Build Refinements - Pre-release. Enhanced Windows executable generation and testing, resolved PowerShell execution policy compatibility issues, improved Windows build scripts for SFML 3.0.1 integration, and version management updated for new pre-release cycle. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Stability Improvements - Final Release. Complete GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline overhaul with race condition fixes, Scout+Warrior release pattern, automated PDF handbook generation, enhanced cross-platform build reliability, and comprehensive documentation improvements. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
PDF handbook generation. Added automated PDF handbook generation to both release and test workflows, automated conversion of HANDBOOK.md to PDF using Pandoc and LaTeX, and comprehensive documentation delivery with game packages. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Version update for continued testing. All debugging improvements from previous versions included, enhanced packaging and upload reliability testing, and comprehensive workflow fixes validation. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Windows debug enhancement. Enhanced Windows packaging debug output, improved file pattern matching for Windows ZIP and EXE uploads, and added comprehensive debugging across all platforms. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Packaging fix. Fixed Linux packaging file pattern matching issues, enhanced packaging debug output, improved upload patterns to handle various naming conventions, and added graceful error handling. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Upload action fix. Switched to svenstaro/upload-release-action for artifact uploads, prevented build jobs from creating duplicate releases, and enhanced upload reliability with explicit upload-only actions. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Workflow dependency fix. Fixed missing needs dependency in Linux build job, corrected job dependency chain for proper workflow execution, and enhanced GitHub Actions workflow reliability. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
GitHub Actions race condition fix. Implemented dedicated release creation job with proper dependencies, eliminated simultaneous release creation conflicts, and guaranteed all artifacts upload to single release. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Multi-platform release coordination improvements. Fixed missing Windows and macOS artifacts in releases, implemented proper job hierarchy, and enhanced cross-platform deployment reliability. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Release workflow and version management improvements. Fixed duplicate release tag issues, enhanced workflow reliability, and resolved Windows packaging pipeline problems. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Windows packaging pipeline fixes and cross-platform build improvements. Fixed CMD syntax errors, unified shell usage, and enhanced GitHub Actions reliability. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Minor improvements and bug fixes following the major 0.9.0 release. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
Welcome Back - Major SFML 3.0 migration release with enhanced performance and modern C++ implementation. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
FPS display feature, window icon support, and performance optimizations. ​ ​ ​ ​ ​
SFML 3.0 migration groundwork and code modernization. ​ ​ ​ ​
